name: RE: Factory
description:
Charge the factory with tiny little capsule! This game is for Secret Santa Jam.

As my giftee CosmicCrystal mention, I try combine the laser gun shooter + platformer gameplay together. One stage only but hope you guys like it!

Control:

  • A / D to move Left / Right.
  • Space to Jump
  • Z for Capsule Shooting.
  • Left click for Mouse Shooting.

Target:

  • Use both capsule and mouse shooting to activate the factory doors and mechanic. When you see the spark, that means it's in active.
  • Reach to the Rightest door. If it's not open, find the way to turn it on!
  • One Touch One Kill! but there're checkpoints so don't worry.
  • Try to finish it with 3 Stars!

Credit:
Programming / Level design: Kiloyd
Asset I used:
Skybox
UI Texture
Stage Model
